custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM OEP_USERMGT_APPROLE2EMPLOYEE WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$] [$WORKINGUNIT_FILTER$]

SELECT OEP_USERMGT_APPROLE.* FROM OEP_USERMGT_APPROLE INNER JOIN OEP_USERMGT_APPROLE2EMPLOYEE ON OEP_USERMGT_APPROLE.APPROLEID=OEP_USERMGT_APPROLE2EMPLOYEE.APPROLEID WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$] [$EMPLOYEE_FILTER$]
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM OEP_USERMGT_APPROLE2EMPLOYEE WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$] [$APPROLE_FILTER$] [$WORKINGUNIT_FILTER$]
